body_html: I wonder how the tests were passing before, as this case is tested in [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_autograd.py#L1005], and the grad_output is different from 1 in the tests...

body: I wonder how the tests were passing before, as this case is tested in [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_autograd.py#L1005], and the [`grad_output` is different from 1 in the tests](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_autograd.py#L1248)...
